synopsis.text: Naoko-san, an extraterrestrial being from the planet Yuri, arrives on Earth with a unique mission: to conquer the planet through the power of "yurification." Misuzu, a young junior high student, finds herself in an unusual predicament when Naoko-san takes up residence on her rooftop. As rumors of a prowling molester circulate in the neighborhood, Misuzu and Naoko-san join forces to investigate and put an end to the menace. Meanwhile, Misuzu eagerly awaits the return of her older sister Naoko, only to discover that the person arriving is none other than Naoko-san, an alien with a fascination for lolicon and lesbianism. With her extraordinary strength and unconventional methods, Naoko-san vows to protect Misuzu and her friends from the lurking groper, making their everyday lives an exciting and unpredictable adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
